reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, with one noting it looks great even without a belt, and appreciate its form-fitting design that cinches at the waist. Customers disagree on whether the dress runs true to size or is slightly large, and similarly, opinions vary on the length, with some finding it just right while others say it's too long.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice maxi dress
items.body: I love this maxi dress. Just wish it had pockets. Wore it to my nephews wedding and I blended in with his attire. Looks good on, fits well and the length is just perfect. Again, I wish there were pockets, as I love pockets. Read more
items.author: Cynthia from Ohio

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love at first fit
items.body: Fantastic blind purchase! Love the spandex , the pockets, a big girl like loves to feel comfortable and this dress will do that for you. The cross over at the top is very well made, I love how it fits, overall a great purchase and now I want more! Read more
items.author: vanessa brooks

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Price and Quality
items.body: Fits perfectly and love the color. The only thing that I didn’t like was that it arrived in a clear bag. I would prefer it being in a concealed package. Read more
items.author: Shirley Pollard

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Fall Dress.Order your true size. Do not order up.
items.body: Cute, soft and cozy dress. Suggested size was wayyyy to big. Would keep it otherwise. Read more
items.author: HairdivA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress. I want it in every color!
items.body: I should buy this in every color. Great fit. Great value. Has pockets. Love it!! Read more
items.author: Erica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit!
items.body: Fits perfectly! You don't need to pin anything on the chest area, perfect coverage. The style made me feel gorgeous. The length is accurate. We'll, you may have to iron it a little because some wrinkles may appear. Read more
items.author: Victoria O. Dawodu

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plus Sized Approved!!! Has Pockets!!!! Gets All the Compliments!!!!
items.body: I absolutely love this dress, its very flattering to my curvy shape, it has pockets!!!!! It wasn't to heavy,the flow is nice when walking. wash on gentle cycle and air dry if possible or fluff/no air in the dryer. The stretch is amazing, I felt very comfortable , I got soooo many compliments in this dress...went to a graduation/brunch event at an upscale location and it was perfect. After sitting,standing ,walking,bending,etc there were no wrinkles to be seen. I'm so happy that I found this dress. I'm 5'2, 245lbs,46DD and purchased a size 2xl...fit perfectly with room to spare.(yes I did wear shapewear underneath to give myself a flawless curvy outline, but it still looked/fit good, even without the shapewear). Read more
items.author: Kris A.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend
items.body: Beautiful dress, nice and very comfortable, received compliments on church. Read more
items.author: Elle

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 8-rose Pink Blue, 4-chocolate, 2-light Purple, 8-purple Gold Stripe, 6-black White Red Stripe, 5-gradient Black Red, 1-purple, 5-black White Square, 1-black, 6-white Rose Stripe, 7-black Pink Wave, 1-white, 2-ink Green, 3-sky Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
